pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Installation`pip install nomnomdata-tools-engine nomnomdata-engine`# Creating a new appInstructions for how to create, build and deploy a new app available here:<https://support.nomnomdata.com/portal/en/kb/articles/creating-your-first-nnd-app>Additional toolkit information available here:<http://developer.nomnomdata.com/>
